CustomField.description: Aggregation of the lead score fields
CustomField.formula: Status_Score__c + Lead_Type_Score__c + Course_of_Interest_Score__c + Start_Date_Score__c + Lead_Subsource_Score__c + Lead_Subsource_Recent_Score__c + Last_Activity_Score__c + Modified_Date_Score__c + Creation_Date_Score__c + Modified_By_Score__c
CustomField.label: Lead Score
